light_name = 'light_3'

    @then(parsers.parse('check manual pairing {light_name} result'))
    def check_manual_result(target, light_name):
        """
        - Narrative:
            check manual pairing result
        """
        light_number = 1
        paired_light_info = []
        logger.info("check manual pairing result")
        # get lights from config file
        lamps = target.config_para['lamps'].copy()
        e = target.ui.home_page.get_light_icon(light_number)
    
        # check if ota icon exists
        logger.info("check if ota icon exits")
        for ota_index in range(65):
            if target.ui.ui_common.is_element_exist_location('id', target.ui.home_page.OTA_ICON):
                time.sleep(10)
            else:
                break
            if ota_index == 64:
                logger.info("====================================================================================")
                logger.info("ERROR : OTA fail after pairing!")
                logger.info("====================================================================================")
                target.ui.ui_common.screen_shot()
                assert False, "OTA fail!"
    
        # check if light icon exist
        if target.ui.ui_common.is_element_exist_location('xpath+id', e):
            # go to light settings page to get light info
            target.ui.home_page.click_light_icon(light_number)
            target.ui.home_page.click_light_settings()
    
            # click light model and get light info
            target.ui.light_settings_page.click_light_model()
            light_info = target.ui.light_info_page.get_light_info()
            time.sleep(2)
    
            # add config lamp info
            if lamps[light_name][0] == light_info['MacAddr']:
                # go back to light setting page
                target.ui.light_info_page.go_back_from_model()
    
                # change light_name
                target.ui.light_settings_page.change_light_name(light_name)
                logger.info("change light name to " + light_name)
                time.sleep(2)
                light_info['LampName'] = light_name
                paired_light_info.append(light_info)
    
                # go back to home page
                target.ui.light_settings_page.go_back_to_home()
                logger.info(light_name + " : " + str(e))
                logger.info(light_name + " showed in App scream!")
                logger.info(paired_light_info)
            else:
                logger.info("====================================================================================")
                logger.info("ERROR : Manual pairing light " + light_name + " fail!")
                logger.info("====================================================================================")
                target.ui.ui_common.screen_shot()
                assert False, "manual pairing light fail, mac address is not equal"
        else:
            logger.info("====================================================================================")
            logger.info("ERROR : No light showed in App scream! No light is found!")
            logger.info("====================================================================================")
            target.ui.ui_common.screen_shot()
